translation.en: Do you know where we are?
I'm having a hard time remembering.

translation.zh: 太诡异了 没有钱包
太诡异了 没有钱包 没有身份证 我身上什么都没有除了醒来的时候手上拿着的这个贝壳

translation.en: I mean, there's nothing on me besides this shell that I woke up holding.
translation.zh: 没有身份证 我身上什么都没有除了醒来的时候手上拿着的这个贝壳

translation.en: I found it next to me on the beach.
translation.zh: 我在旁边的海滩上发现的

translation.en: It's a lot more useful than this shell.
translation.zh: 可比这个贝壳有用多了

translation.en: So, we don't know who or where we are.
translation.zh: 所以我们不知道自己是谁也不知道在哪儿

translation.en: Listen, okay? I'll put this shell down.
translation.zh: 听着 好吗？我会把这贝壳放下

translation.en: Why don't you put the knife down, okay? You clearly don't know how to hold one.
translation.zh: 你为什么不把刀放下呢？你显然不知道怎么握刀

translation.en: How would you know a thing like that, huh?
Give the knife back to me.
We have company. We shouldn't be waving--
translation.zh: 有人来了 我们不能挥舞着…

translation.en: Around the corner, there are others.
translation.zh: 转角的地方还有其他人
这边 往这边 放下

translation.en: -[man 1] Okay, let's rest. -[woman 2] Yeah, that's good.
translation.zh: -好了 休息一下吧-还需要什么？ 可以了 够了

translation.en: All right, just take a little sip for now.
translation.zh: 好了 先喝一小口吧这些椰子里的椰汁

translation.en: -Those things don't have that much milk. -Thanks.
translation.zh: 好了 先喝一小口吧这些椰子里的椰汁 -不多-谢谢

translation.en: Nobody can remember anything at all about how we woke up here?
translation.zh: 大家都一点都不记得我们为什么会在这里醒来吗？
-我毛都不记得-什么都不记得

translation.en: It's not possible that we all have amnesia.
translation.zh: 我们不可能都得了失忆症

translation.en: Okay, well, we may be on, I don't know,
translation.zh: 好吧 我不知道 也许我们

translation.en: some kind of work trip or something?
Since our clothes are all so similar.
translation.zh: 因为我们穿的衣服都很相似

translation.en: I don't think this is team building.
translation.zh: 我不觉得我们是在搞团建

translation.en: Then, what? I mean, our plane went down?
translation.zh: 那是什么？我们的飞机坠机了？

translation.en: Ten people walk away from something like that
translation.zh: 十个人从那样的事故中逃生

translation.en: There's no floating luggage around anywhere out in the water.
translation.zh: 水面上也没有漂浮着任何行李

translation.en: -There's no dead bodies. -Dead bodies don't float...
translation.zh: -也没有尸体-尸体不会浮在水上

translation.en: All I'm saying is, it doesn't add up.

translation.zh: 你说得对 的确说不通

translation.en: Say it again. Doesn't add up.
Makes you feel better? Doesn't add up.
translation.zh: 这样你感觉好点吗？说不通
你知道吗 你真的充满敌意

translation.en: Can I see something on your shirt?

translation.zh: -好的 怎么了？-不 别动

translation.en: No. I just want to check out your tag.

translation.zh: 也许只是设计师的名字

translation.en: Come on, all of us wearing the same tag? Same label?
translation.zh: 拜托 我们所有人的标签都一样？一样的商标？

translation.en: My name's Cooper. I don't remember that at all.
translation.zh: 我叫库珀 完全不记得

translation.en: -[Moses] What's your name? -[chuckling] Mine's, um, Blair.
So, do any of you guys want to head out with me?
translation.zh: 你们有谁想和我一起出发吗？

translation.en: I just want to figure this thing out.
translation.zh: 我只是想把事情给搞清楚

translation.en: Where we are, who we are? You know, little details like that.
translation.zh: 我们在哪儿？我们是谁？类似这样的细节
我们刚搞清楚了自己的名字

translation.en: Maybe we just learned our names.
translation.zh: 我们也许搞清楚了自己的名字
看来是没人加入了 切斯

translation.en: Maybe you did figure out our names.
translation.zh: 你也许帮我们搞清楚了自己的名字

translation.en: Good for you. But I already have one picked out for you.
translation.zh: 多谢你了但我已经给你挑了个好名字

translation.en: I'm sure it's the same one I've got for you.
translation.zh: 我敢肯定和我给你挑的名字一样

translation.en: I'll come with you. See what's what.
translation.zh: 我和你一起去看看情况吧

translation.en: Well, I guess I'll see you guys later.
[Donovan] We found something in every spot where someone was lying.
translation.zh: 我们在每个人躺着的地方都找有发现

translation.en: Yeah. Thank God we came when we did.
translation.zh: 是啊 感谢上帝我们及时出发了

translation.en: A little bit longer, that tide would've came in.
translation.zh: 再多等一小会儿就涨潮了

translation.en: -[Donovan] This is not a coincidence. -Tell me about it.
translation.zh: 这不是巧合 还用你说

translation.en: What are we even doing out here?
translation.zh: 我们究竟在这儿干什么？

translation.en: Maybe we're dead and this is heaven.
translation.zh: 也许我们死了 这里是天堂

translation.en: Time for the gun show. What a surprise.
translation.zh: 秀肌肉的时刻到了 一点都不奇怪

translation.en: find some fresh water and shelter.
I don't think I can deal with that other chick again.
translation.zh: 我觉得我没法继续应付那个妹子了

translation.en: I'mma head back, hang with the others. It's too hot for me.
translation.zh: 我先回去找其他人了 这里太热了
鹰级童子军 不能撒谎

translation.en: Yeah, well, thanks for not making me do the same.
translation.zh: 谢谢你没让我也跟着回去

translation.en: -Where do you want to go? -Let's go that way.
is we don't know that aliens didn't drop us here
translation.zh: 我们不能确信不是外星人把我们扔到这里

translation.en: Does anyone have any visible injuries or pain?
translation.zh: 有人有任何可见的伤口或痛处吗？
-没有-好的 所以不是由创伤引起的失忆

translation.en: you want to sit with us?

translation.zh: 我在这儿挺好的 谢了
有人想起来任何东西了吗？

translation.en: I vaguely remember having a strong dislike for optimists.
translation.zh: 我依稀记得我特别讨厌乐观主义者

translation.en: How about I say a word,
translation.zh: 这样吧 我说一个词

translation.en: and then you all say the first thing that comes to mind?
translation.zh: 你们都说出脑子里想到的第一个东西

translation.en: Come on! Why'd you start with food? I'm starving.
translation.zh: 拜托 为什么要从食物开始说起？我饿死了

translation.en: Let's just crack open some coconuts over there.
translation.zh: 我们去那边开几个椰子吧  -行吗？-好的 谢谢

translation.en: What do you think about all those people?
Hmm, checking each other out, trying to mate based on sexual attraction.
translation.zh: 互相打量试图根据性吸引力互相交配
一个知识分子沉默地对他们进行着判断

translation.en: You kinda don't say anything at all.
-[fire crackling] -[Hayden] Yeah. Here we go. That's it.
translation.zh: 是的 来了 就这样

translation.en: We should be careful about spending too much time in the sun.
translation.zh: 我们应该小心一点不要在太阳下待太长时间
黑色素瘤可不是开玩笑的

translation.en: I haven't seen a single plane since we woke up here,
translation.zh: 我们在这里醒过来之后我没有见过任何飞机

translation.en: I just wanna spend the rest of my days on this deserted island in peace,
translation.zh: 我只想安静地在这个被遗弃的孤岛上度过我的余生

translation.en: Flirting with each other somewhere. Who cares?
translation.zh: 在别的地方互相调情吧谁在乎这些？

translation.en: -Let's go swimming. -I'm not moping, I'm tanning.
translation.zh: -一起去游泳吧-不是消沉 我在晒日光浴

translation.en: Come to help you guys. -[Cooper panting]
translation.zh: 我来帮你们了 我能做些什么？
我来帮你们了 我能做些什么？ -瞧瞧谁回来了-来吧失败者们 一起去游泳啊！

translation.en: Come on, you losers! Let's go swimming!
translation.zh: -瞧瞧谁回来了-来吧失败者们 一起去游泳啊！

translation.en: We're in paradise. Let's live a little.
translation.zh: 我们在天堂 及时行乐吧

translation.en: [Donovan] Watch out, I'm gonna get you! [laughs] Yeah!
translation.zh: 小心点 我要来追你了！

translation.en: I'm gonna stay here and finish this, I think.
translation.zh: 我还是待在这里干完这个吧

translation.en: I don't know if I can swim.
♪ All the guys All around the world'll say it ♪
Well, at least now we have some fresh water.
translation.zh: 这下子我们至少有淡水了

translation.en: -We could probably live here if we had to. -Yeah, we could.
translation.zh: -迫不得已 我们八成能在这里住下去-是啊 可以的

translation.en: Maybe we shouldn't tell the others about this.
translation.zh: 也许我们应该瞒着其他人

translation.en: I just think it should be our little secret for now.
translation.zh: 我只是觉得这里暂时可以作为我俩的小秘密

translation.en: You know, great minds and all that. -[chuckles] -Plus, you never know.
translation.zh: 你懂的 英雄所见略同而且你永远都猜不到的

translation.en: So it's the whole survival of the fittest kinda thing, huh?
translation.zh: 所以像是适者生存那种情况 是吗？

translation.en: Well, I mean, you are pretty fit.
translation.zh: 是啊 而且你的身材本来就很适合
多谢了 你身材也很好

translation.en: Come on! Hey! I said no.

translation.zh: -怎么了？-快来啊 各位 快来！

translation.en: -[Hayden] What? Guys, get out! -[Taylor] Help! Somebody, help! Help!
translation.zh: 什么？谁救救我！救命！ -大家快上岸！-救命！
嘿 帮帮她 她恐慌发作了！

translation.en: -Come on! I need a hand! -Hey! Help her!
-Fuck! -[Cooper] Hey, come back to the beach!
translation.zh: -该死！-嘿 快回到海滩上来

translation.en: [Hayden] No, hey. Mason, are you okay?
translation.zh: 不 留下别走 梅森 你没事吧？

translation.en: What was it? What was it?
[Hayden] You okay? What the fuck happened?
translation.zh: 你没事吧？该死的发生了什么？
嘿 瞧瞧我们发现了什么
大家为什么都这么安静？
之前和你在一起的那个

translation.en: The guy with the long hair.
He went out swimming, so we all joined him,
translation.zh: 他跑去游泳 我们就都加入了他

translation.en: you know, just for some fun.
A shark or a fucking who knows what.
translation.zh: 鲨鱼 还不知道是什么别的狗屎东西
不重要了 他已经死了

translation.en: Where'd you get all that stuff?
translation.zh: 你从哪儿找来的那些东西？

translation.en: Chase isn't a bitch, she's just--
translation.zh: 切斯不是个婊子 她只是…

translation.en: She just happens to find all that survival gear?
translation.zh: 她就是碰巧找到了这么多生存工具？

translation.en: Y'all know what I'm talking about.
She just starts digging around in the sand, where we all woke up?
translation.zh: 她就在我们醒来的地方胡乱挖掘？
“哦 瞧 这儿有个贝壳

translation.en: "Oh, cool. Here's a first aid kit."
translation.zh: 哦 酷 这儿有个急救箱”

translation.en: -Shit doesn't just happen. -So what are you saying?
translation.zh: -屁事不会莫名其妙发生-什么意思？
屁事不会莫名其妙发生

translation.en: Where is she, by the way?
We split up, looking for stuff,
like food and whatever. I thought she'd be back here before me.
translation.zh: 找食物那些我以为她会在我之前回来

translation.en: You know what, why don't we move down there, behind the rocks?
translation.zh: 这样吧 不如我们到那边去那些石头后面？

translation.en: There's less wind, and we can build a real fire.
translation.zh: 风会小一点 就能正儿八经生个火

translation.en: The smoke can be a signal to people.
translation.zh: 可以用烟给别人发送信号

translation.en: -Like a boat or a plane or something. -Who?

translation.zh: 你开玩笑吗？你是认真的？

translation.en: Why don't you grab this stuff, and we'll all go.
translation.zh: 不如你们把东西拿上 我们过去

translation.en: [Blair scoffs] Why? Who said he's the leader?
translation.zh: 为什么？谁任命他做领导了？
莫斯？ -没叫错吧 莫斯-是

translation.en: You collect the coconuts, all right?
translation.zh: 你负责收集椰子 好吗？
把那些都放在一起 然后…

translation.en: You seem pretty good with the hatchet. Maybe we can use that to...
translation.zh: 你看起来很擅长用斧子也许我们可以用它来…

translation.en: You two, if you guys carry on collecting the firewood...
translation.zh: 你们俩 如果可以继续捡柴火的话…

translation.en: I just-- I think it's better if we work together as a team.
translation.zh: 我只是…我觉得如果我们齐心协力 -会更好一点-好的

translation.en: Don't you fucking ever touch me again!
-You hear me? Don't you fucking ever-- -[Brody groans]
Don't you ever touch me again, or anybody here, do you hear me?
translation.zh: 你别想再碰我 任何人都别想 听到了吗？我他妈会杀了你！
听到了吗？我他妈会杀了你！

translation.en: Let go of me. [panting] Did you tell 'em about the waterfall?
translation.zh: 放开我 他告诉你们瀑布的事了吗？

translation.en: -[Cooper] What waterfall? -All the things that we found? Did you?
translation.zh: -什么瀑布？-还有我们找到的那些东西？ 有吗？他告诉你们了吗？

translation.en: But he wanted to call it our little secret.
translation.zh: 但他想把那里叫做我俩的小秘密

translation.en: At least that's what he said before he attacked me.
translation.zh: 至少是在他攻击我之前

translation.en: -Attacked you? -[Chase] Yes, attacked me, you liar!
translation.zh: -攻击你？-是啊 攻击我 你个撒谎精！

translation.en: She's the one who came on to me.

translation.zh: 你亲的我！ 你该死的…
顺便说 多诺万死了

translation.en: So maybe you should think about what's important here.
translation.zh: 所以也许你应该考虑一下什么才是重要的事

translation.en: would you stop by and pick fruit for everyone straight after?
translation.zh: 你是会顺路给大家摘点水果？

translation.en: go straight back to wherever and do something about it?
translation.zh: 直接回来 或者做些什么？

translation.en: [chuckles] Oh! "Hey, got some bananas and mangoes,
translation.zh: “嘿 搞到了一些香蕉和芒果

translation.en: and by the way, this guy over here, he attacked me."
translation.zh: 顺便说 那边那个人攻击了我”

translation.en: -I mean, that's insane talk! -You fucking attacked me!
translation.zh: -这是疯子才会说的话-你他妈就是攻击了我！

translation.en: Don't touch me! Any of you!
translation.zh: 不许碰我！你们都不许碰我！
没什么 我们亲了一下 仅此而已

translation.en: [Hayden] This is crazy, right? All this?
translation.zh: 这一切都太疯狂了 不是吗？

translation.en: I don't know. I have a bad feeling about this.
translation.zh: 不知道 我有不良的预感

translation.en: -Stay with us, all right? -Shit! That's unreal!
translation.zh: -保持清醒 好吗？-这不可能

translation.en: He just grabbed me. Come on. Can you hear me?
translation.zh: 他刚刚还抓了我 来吧

translation.en: [Cooper] The shark tore him up good.
translation.zh: -能听到吗？-他被鲨鱼扯得很严重

translation.en: Okay, we need to get the first aid kit. Somebody needs to go now--
translation.zh: 好的 我们得去拿急救箱 -谁现在去拿一下-你开玩笑嘛？
-谁现在去拿一下-你开玩笑嘛？

translation.en: It probably has Spider-Man Band-Aids. That's not gonna do anything.
translation.zh: 里面八成只会有画着蜘蛛侠的创口贴而已

translation.en: Here, I'll help you with his leg.
translation.zh: 来 我帮你处理他的腿

translation.en: -[Donovan wails in pain] -[Hayden] I'll get the kit. -Put on a tourniquet. -[Chase] Let me help you.
translation.zh: -我去吧 我去拿-我需要给他的腿上止血带

translation.en: Isn't that the guy that pushed you in front of the shark?
translation.zh: -我来帮你处理-那不是把你 -推到鲨鱼面前的人吗？-不重要了 好的
-推到鲨鱼面前的人吗？-不重要了 好的

translation.en: -[screams in pain] -What do we do? -I don't know what to do. -We need to get him back.
translation.zh: -我们要怎么做？我没主意-我们需要立刻把他抬回去 好吗？

translation.en: Okay, so I need everybody to get underneath him.
translation.zh: 所以我需要所有人把手伸到他身下

translation.en: [Blair] Please, someone else can-- Taylor, can you come over here, please?
translation.zh: 拜托了 再要一个人…泰勒你能到这边来吗？

translation.en: [Chase] Get him back to the fire so he can stay warm.
translation.zh: 把他抬回火堆边 -给他保暖-冷静下来 深呼吸
-给他保暖-冷静下来 深呼吸

translation.en: Okay, so I'm gonna tell you when to lift him.
translation.zh: 我会告诉你们什么时候开始抬

translation.en: -We need to keep the wound raised. -[Cooper] Okay.
translation.zh: -我们需要将伤口保持在高位-好

translation.en: Two... Lift him really, really slowly and steadily, okay?
translation.zh: 二 非常缓慢而平稳地 把他抬起来 好吗？

translation.en: [Blair] It's okay. It's okay. It's not long now.
Come on. Guys, fucking move it!
translation.zh: 快点啊 各位 都给我快点走！

translation.en: For what you did or lying about it?
translation.zh: 为你的行为还是你为此撒的谎？

translation.en: more of a general type of thing.
translation.zh: 比较普遍意义上的道歉

translation.en: I mean, it doesn't matter, but people are gonna...
translation.zh: 不重要了 但是人们会…

translation.en: Things are gonna get a lot worse out here before they get any better.
translation.zh: 事情有转机之前还会越来越糟

translation.en: You're smart, I know you can see that.
translation.zh: 你很聪明 我知道你能看得出来

translation.en: We don't even know what's going on.
translation.zh: 我们都不知道发生了什么

translation.en: We don't have a clue how we woke up here.
translation.zh: 不知道为什么会在这里醒过来

translation.en: I just think that people need to...
end up on the right side with each other before it's too late.
translation.zh: 在无法挽回之前处理好彼此之间的关系

translation.en: Before things start to go down or fall apart.
translation.zh: 赶在情况开始急转直下或彻底崩塌之前

translation.en: Look, that's all I wanted to say.
translation.zh: 听着 这就是我想说的

translation.en: So, you just want me to forget the fact that you just jumped on me,
translation.zh: 所以你就想让我忘记你直接把我扑倒

translation.en: held me down, and all that?
translation.zh: 压着我不放 所有这些？

translation.en: Why? Because it's-- it's gonna get worse for me?
translation.zh: 为什么？因为之后我的处境会更糟？

translation.en: How much worse for me is it gonna get? I'm just curious.
translation.zh: 还能糟到什么程度？我很好奇

translation.en: the rest of them, they, uh...
So I told them that I'd come over here and tell you.
translation.zh: 所以我告诉他们说我会过来告诉你这件事

translation.en: I hope you can join us.
Yeah, I got a couple ideas.
I'm sure the folks are gonna wanna put things to a vote at some point.
translation.zh: 我敢肯定到了某个时间点 大家会想要投票做决定

translation.en: You know, I don't need you.
You know that, right? I was just being nice.
translation.zh: 你知道这点吧？我只是表示善意

translation.en: And they're also kinda worried about that, um...
Why don't you tell them that I'm holding it
translation.zh: 那你为什么不告诉他们

translation.en: just in case you try to rape me again, you fucker?
translation.zh: 我是为了防备你再次强暴我 杂种？

translation.en: And we all know what happens to him, don't we?
translation.zh: 你知道来使有可能被斩吧？

translation.en: I wasn't trying to rape you.

translation.zh: -你没有？真的？-我的意思是 在这样的地方

translation.en: There's no such thing like that in a place like this.
translation.zh: -你没有？真的？-我的意思是 在这样的地方 没有那种东西

translation.en: There's just sex and no sex.
translation.zh: 只有性交和无性交两种

translation.en: I know it's a risk, but I think it's a risk worth taking.
translation.zh: 我知道这有风险但我觉得值得担风险

translation.en: Especially because we got someone who's injured.
translation.zh: 尤其是考虑到 我们之中有个伤者

translation.en: I don't think we should move him.
translation.zh: 我觉得我们不应该转移他

translation.en: Didn't know whether I should be here or not, but then I figured, hey,
translation.zh: 我不知道应不应该来的 但我想着 嘿

translation.en: you guys are all that I have, so, let this big council meeting begin.
translation.zh: 我也只剩你们几位可以依靠了所以 我们来开会吧

translation.en: We don't know why and we don't know how, but it's real.
translation.zh: 不知道为什么 不知道是怎么来的但这是事实

translation.en: We can get sunburned or killed by shit in the water.
translation.zh: 我们可能会被晒伤或者被海里的东西给杀掉

translation.en: And we're gonna get hungry and thirsty.
All I'm proposing is that we all take a vote
translation.zh: 我只是在提议我们投个票

translation.en: to move off the beach to a little spot inland,
translation.zh: 从海滩转移到岛屿内部的一个地方
有庇护所 我们会受到保护

translation.en: And where no one knows where we're at.
translation.zh: 没人会知道我们在那里

translation.en: Face facts. We're out here on our own.
translation.zh: 面对事实吧 我们孤立无援

translation.en: We have to have hope, right?
translation.zh: 我们必须要抱持着希望 不是吗？

translation.en: without any shelter, out in the open.
translation.zh: 没有庇护所 就这么露天待着

translation.en: I'll tell you what, I promise you this,
translation.zh: 这么说吧 我可以向你们保证

translation.en: we haven't seen half the shit this island's gonna throw at us.
translation.zh: 我们对这个岛屿的情况了解还不到一半

translation.en: That's a fact. We have to be ready.
translation.zh: 这是事实 我们必须要做好准备

translation.en: -[chuckles] Wow. -We need to keep this fire going,
translation.zh: -哇-我们需要让火堆继续燃烧着

translation.en: take turns searching for food, getting water,

translation.zh: -这是我的想法-或者我们可以试着逃出去

translation.en: -Or we try to get out of here. -What are you gonna use for a boat?
translation.zh: -这是我的想法-或者我们可以试着逃出去 你要用什么来造船？

translation.en: maybe that cute little knife you got in your belt?
translation.zh: 你腰带上挂着的可爱的小刀？

translation.en: Why don't you try listening for once?
translation.zh: 你就不能闭嘴听听别人的意见吗？

translation.en: Do you have a piece of info that we don't have?
translation.zh: 你有什么我们没掌握的信息吗？

translation.en: Why the hell would you say, "Get outta here"?
translation.zh: 你究竟为什么会说“逃出去”？

translation.en: Do you guys know these two here?
translation.zh: 你们认识这边这两位吗？

translation.en: [Chase] This guy over here and this girl?
This is Mason and that's Hayden.
translation.zh: 他是梅森 她是海登

translation.en: moving along the beach, in an odd way,
translation.zh: 以某种奇怪的方式沿着海滩走

translation.en: like if they were counting steps or something.
translation.zh: 好像在计算步数之类的

translation.en: -There's more to it, wasn't there? -Probably dumb, just forget it.
translation.zh: -是不是有更多发现？-八成是瞎猜的 别管了

translation.en: It was the number of steps...
translation.zh: 我们注意到 每个人之间

translation.en: That's what we noticed. They were equidistant, all of them.
translation.zh: 相隔的步数 每个人之间的距离都一样

translation.en: When I kept finding things buried in the sand,
translation.zh: 我不停地找到埋在沙子里的东西时

translation.en: first there was one, and then there was another.
translation.zh: 一开始找到一个 然后又找到一个

translation.en: I mean, the rest I guessed,
It was 39 steps between each of us,
I tried to be as even as possible
translation.zh: 我试着尽量每步都平均

translation.en: because it's not an exact unit of measurement, but...
translation.zh: 因为步数并不是精确的测量单位但是…

translation.en: Isn't that a movie or something? 39 Steps?
translation.zh: 不是有个电影之类的吗《三十九级台阶》？

translation.en: That probably doesn't have anything to do with this.
translation.zh: 八成和这没有任何关系
但问题的关键就在这里

translation.en: We have to be open to what's around us.
translation.zh: 我们必须要持开放心态面对我们周围的东西

translation.en: Try to remember things of our lives
translation.zh: 记起我们生命中的事物

translation.en: that would help us figure out what the hell all this means.
translation.zh: 帮我们搞清楚这些究竟意味着什么

translation.en: It could be something, it could be nothing,
translation.zh: 可能有意义 可能没意义

translation.en: We calculated the number of steps we had
translation.zh: 我们计算了每个人之间的步数

translation.en: times the number of people that existed here.
And then we followed that number.
translation.zh: 然后我们跟着这个数字走

translation.en: Yeah, since when did this become a math problem?
translation.zh: 这什么时候变成数学题了？

translation.en: There's a guy dying over there.
translation.zh: 那边有个人在垂死挣扎

translation.en: Can we please, please take a vote?
translation.zh: 能不能拜托大家直接投票？
那个…不把海洋计算在内

translation.en: since it would be impossible to go out there and calculate steps
translation.zh: 因为不可能一边游泳一边以可靠的方式

translation.en: in a credible way while swimming and--
we began taking a series of random samplings
translation.zh: 我们开始做一系列的随机抽样

translation.en: in terms of jungle and also in both directions on the beach,
translation.zh: 包括丛林以及海滩的两个方向
将我们之间最大和最小的个头

translation.en: based on the biggest and smallest of us,
eight. I just want to be sure.
translation.zh: 八 我只想确认一下

translation.en: [Chase] I really don't know if it was a good idea to leave him behind.
translation.zh: 我真的不知道把他一个人丢下是不是个好主意

translation.en: I was down this beach earlier, and I didn't even see it.
translation.zh: 我之前来过这片海滩 当时都没看见

translation.en: I mean, not that I was looking for it, but there it is, in plain English.
translation.zh: 当然我也没有特意要找但你瞧 很清楚地写明了

translation.en: Yeah, it's a sign that's exactly the same amount of steps
translation.zh: 没错 是个标牌和在这个岛上醒来的人之间的距离

translation.en: as it is from the people that woke up on this island.

translation.zh: 上面写着“找到你们回去的路”
是啊 就是这么写的

translation.en: You know, this is actually bad news,
'cause whoever made this sign is gone,
translation.zh: 因为做这个牌子的人已经不在了

translation.en: so they either figured something out or...
translation.zh: 所以说 他们要么想出了什么办法

translation.en: It's not like it's magic. It's not even math.
translation.zh: 这并不是魔法 甚至都不是数学

translation.en: They just walked down the beach and found it.
translation.zh: 他们就沿着海滩走 然后找到了这个

translation.en: If they hadn't, someone else would've.
translation.zh: 如果没找到 其他人也会找到

translation.en: Hey, it's cool, it's just not-- not a grocery store or ice cream.
translation.zh: 嘿 这挺酷的只不过不是杂货店或者冰淇淋

translation.en: We're hungry, and it's not even a map that tells us where we are.
translation.zh: 我们都饿了甚至不是一个指点方位的地图

translation.en: How do you know that that's not what this is?
translation.zh: 你怎么知道这不是地图？

translation.en: -No, honestly, how do you know? -It's not. Look, it's a sign.
translation.zh: -不 认真的 你怎么知道？-它就不是 看 是个标牌
这是我们的第一个线索

translation.en: It's-- It's something. I know it is.
translation.zh: 肯定有含义的 我敢肯定

translation.en: I should go check on Donovan.
translation.zh: 我该回去看一下多诺万的情况了

translation.en: Does it say "find your way home"?
translation.zh: 写的并不是“找到回家的路”
而是“回去” 回到某个地方去

translation.en: -I just don't know where "where" is. -[Hayden] Who knows?
translation.zh: -我只是不知道回去哪里-谁知道？

translation.en: Maybe they're right. It means nothing.
translation.zh: 也许他们说得对 也许没有意义

translation.en: It could just be a sign.
translation.zh: 可能仅仅是个标牌而已

translation.en: An actual sign, left here by someone a long time ago
translation.zh: 真正意义上的标牌是很久之前某些人留下的
关于一些毫无意义的东西

translation.en: [Mason] Do you think the numbers are just all chance?
translation.zh: 你觉得步数都只是巧合吗？
